sense.gloss: first person (to do), person going first
first place, top position, person in the top position, person in the lead

sdata.j: スーは↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑学校↑↓がっこう↓で↑一番↑↓|いちばん↓テ|ニスが↑上手↑↓じょうず↓だ。
sdata.e: Sue is the best tennis player in our school.

sdata.j: |いちばん↑適↑↓て|き↓している↑仕事↑↓しごと↓につくべきです。
sdata.e: You should get the job for which you are best fitted.
